entry.title: Ravintola Trappi
entry.summary: üá™üá∫ This post is also in English. (Vierit√§ alas n√§hd√§ksesi suloinen lintu üê¶.) Ravintola Trappi sijaitsee Naantalissa. Saatat tuntea t√§m√§n…
entry.content:
üá™üá∫ This post is also in English.

(Vierit√§ alas n√§hd√§ksesi suloinen lintu üê¶.)

Ravintola Trappi sijaitsee Naantalissa. Saatat tuntea t√§m√§n aurinkoisen kaupungin kahdesta syyst√§. Yksi, Muumimaailma sijaitsee Naantalissa. Ja kaksi, Suomen presidentill√§ on kes√§asunto Kultaranta Naantalissa. Noh, kolmas syy ‚Äì tietysti ‚Äì tuntea Naantali on t√§m√§ Ravintola Trappi! Sill√§ on tiedett√§v√§sti historiaa jo vuodesta 1472, jolloin kyseinen kiinteist√∂ lahjoitettiin tuolloin toimivalle luostarille.

Joten voit kuvitella, ett√§ kiinteist√∂√§ ovat aikojen saatossa hallinnoineet monet munkit, merirosvot* ja ravintoloitsijat. 2023 Ravintola Trapin omistaja vaihtui j√§lleen ja nyt se kuuluu Kalludran perheelle. Ekrem Kalludra on toiminut ravintolan p√§√§kokkina yli kymmenen vuotta, ja kun h√§nelle kerrottiin ostomahdollisuudesta, p√§√§t√∂s oli helppo. Helppoa se, mutta yrityksen omistajan vaihtaminen ei. Uudet omistajat kokivat muun muassa Ravintola Trappin nettisivujen p√§ivitt√§misen ongelmalliseksi. T√§llaiseen ongelmanratkaisuun on Raccoonbox.

* V√§rik√§st√§ merirosvoel√§m√§√§ viett√§nyt, jopa Pohjolan Herkuleeksikin kutsuttu, V√§kev√§ Paroni vapaaherra Otto Fleming on asunut Trapin kiinteist√∂ss√§. Kuulun voimamiehen muistokivi on l√§heisell√§ hautausmaalla.

Wordpress ei ole niin hyv√§...

WordPress on suosittu sis√§ll√∂nhallintaj√§rjestelm√§. Ja mielest√§ni se on liian suosittu. Vaikka sit√§ mainostetaan k√§ytt√§j√§yst√§v√§llisen√§ ohjelmana, jota ei-ammattilaiset voivat helposti k√§ytt√§√§, en ole viel√§ tavannut asiakasta, joka ei WordPressi√§ kokisi haastavaksi, riippumatta siit√§, kuinka hyvin h√§nt√§ on konsultoitu.

Ravintola Trappilla oli ongelmia WordPressin kanssa. Sivuston niin kutsuttu "helppo" sivunrakennuslis√§osa oli vanhentunut ja vaikea k√§ytt√§√§. Se oli vaikeaa jopa minulle! Ja usko pois, olen rakentanut tusinoittain WordPress-sivustoja! Kuvittele, ettet ole koskaan k√§ytt√§nyt WordPressi√§, ja l√∂yd√§t itsesi nyt sadan painikkeen edess√§, joista yksik√§√§n ei anna ymm√§rrett√§v√§√§ palautetta esimerkiksi kansi- tai bannerikuvien muuttamisesta. Yleens√§ en halua suositella WordPressi√§ asiakkaalleni. Neuvon ottamaan WordPressin k√§ytt√∂√∂n vain niiss√§ tapauksissa, joissa sivun ainoana tavoitteena on toimia blogina, kuten konstantin.fi. Kokemukseni mukaan nykyaikaiset web-suunnitteluj√§rjestelm√§t, kuten Publii, Jekyll ja Wix, tarjoavat nopeampia ja tehokkaampia vaihtoehtoja WordPressille. Ne k√§ytt√§v√§t uusinta teknologiaa ja ovat aidosti k√§ytt√§j√§yst√§v√§llisi√§. WordPress on kuin l√§hett√§isi elefantin peuranmets√§stykseen m√§yr√§koiran sijaan. Elefantti saa ty√∂ns√§ tehty√§, mutta kalliilla hinnalla, hitaalla nopeudella ja tehden suurta vahinkoa mets√§lle.

TableAgent ja lintu

TableAgent on tehokas ravintoloitsijoiden varausj√§rjestelm√§, joka sis√§lt√§√§ reaaliaikaisen varauksen, mukautettavat p√∂yt√§kartat ja asiakashallintaominaisuudet. Se k√§ytt√§√§ automaattisia muistutuksia, tukee hyv√§√§ asiakaskokemusta ja v√§hent√§√§ varausten unohtamista. Mik√§ parasta, se on ilmainen alusta, n√§in tehden siit√§ kiehtovan vaihtoehdon ravintoloitsijalle. Raccoonbox asensi t√§llaisen j√§rjestelm√§n Ravintola Trappin verkkosivuille. Asennus ei ole vaikeaa. Raccoonbox voi ottaa TableAgentin k√§ytt√∂√∂n yhdess√§ tai kahdessa p√§iv√§ss√§. T√§m√§ aika sis√§lt√§√§ sek√§ asennuksen ett√§ opastuksen.

Ja luvattu s√∂p√∂ lintu? Miss√§ on?! ‚Äî T√Ñ√ÑLL√Ñ! Pieni s√∂p√∂l√§inen p√∂ll√§hti kuvaan, kun kuvasin j√§√§tel√∂√§ uuteen j√§lkiruokamenuun (lis√§√§ Raccoonboxin graafisesta suunnittelusta). Onko j√§√§tel√∂n√§lk√§? Tule Ravintola Trappiin!

Tehd√§√§nk√∂ herkullista ravintolan web-suunnittelua? Kyll√§!

entry.title: Restaurant Trappi
entry.summary: üá´üáÆ T√§m√§ julkaisu on my√∂s suomeksi! (Scroll all the way down to see a cute bird üê¶.) Restaurant Trappi is…
entry.content:
üá´üáÆ T√§m√§ julkaisu on my√∂s suomeksi!

(Scroll all the way down to see a cute bird üê¶.)

Restaurant Trappi is located in Naantali Finland. You might know this small town for two reasons. One, the Moominworld is located in Naantali. And two, Finnish president is having his summer residence, Kultaranta, in Naantali. Now, the third reason‚Äîof course‚Äîto know Naantali is this Restaurant Trappi! It has history all the way back to 1472 when the old restaurant real estate was donated to, at that time active monastery. 

So you can imagine that over the ages, the property has been administered by a number of monks, pirates*, and restaurateurs. 2023 the ownership of Restaurant Trappi was changed again, and it now belongs to the Kalludra family. Ekrem Kalludra has been the restaurant's head chef for over ten years, and when he was notified about the potential of purchasing, his decision was easy. Easy that, but changing the company's ownership is not. Among other troubles, the new owners struggled with the Restaurant Trappi's websites. In this situation, Raccoonbox was able to assist the new owners.

* Fierce Baron Otto Fleming, also known as the Northern Hercules, spent an eventful life as a pirate. He lived in the estate that today is Restaurant Trappi. Otto's memorial stone is located in a local cemetery.

Wordpress is not that good...

WordPress is a popular content management system. And, I think it's too popular. While it is advertised as a user-friendly interface that is simple for non-professionals to use, I have never seen a client who did not struggle with WordPress. Regardless of how well documented or consulted he or she is.

Restaurant Trappi experienced issues with WordPress. The site's so-called "easy" page builder plugin was out of date and difficult to use. It was difficult even for me! And, trust me, I have build dozens of WordPress sites! Imagine you've never used WordPress before, and find yourself in front of one hundred buttons, none of which provide comprehensible feedback on how to alter, say, feature or banner pictures. Usually, I like not to recommend WordPress to any of my clients. Only in cases when the sole objective is to serve as a blog, like I do at konstantin.fi. In my experience, modern web design systems, such as Publii, Jekyll, and Wix, offer speedier and more efficient alternatives to WordPress. They employ latest technologies and are genuinely user-friendly. WordPress is like sending an elephant on a deer hunt instead of a dachshund. The elephant does get the job done, but at a heavy price, slow speed and great damage to the forest.

TableAgent and a bird

TableAgent is a powerful reservation system for restaurateurs that includes real-time booking, customisable floor layouts, and customer management capabilities. It uses automated reminders to increase table turnover, improve client experiences, and reduce no-shows. Best of all, it is a free platform, making it an affordable option for any restaurant. Such system was installed on Restaurant Trappi's website. The installation is not difficult. Raccoonbox can implement TableAgent in your system in one to two days. That includes both consulting and teaching.

And the promised cute bird? Where is is?! ‚Äî HERE! The little cutie photo bombed the moment when I was taking picture of ice cream for the new dessert menu (more about Raccoonbox graphic design). Ice cream hungry? Come to Restaurant Trappi!

Lets make delicious restaurant web design, shall we?

entry.content:

Autopesu-Center and Raccoonbox has been collaborating for years. And it is nice to see the positive fruit of a good business relationship. The image above is how the car wash facade looks like now. Image below are about the design and also what is was before.

This other project was done for a container company to make their wall look fitting for their business.

Here is yet another large print design for an exchibition.

And this, I believe is the biggest print that Raccoonbox has ever done!

So! Feeling big? Do you want to go big? Are you big enough? Kek, kek. Lets make some big design! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

entry.title: Web design
entry.summary: Web design is mainly problem solving design. You have a web problem and Raccoonbox will solve it. Lol! üòÖ But…
entry.content:
Web design is mainly problem solving design. You have a web problem and Raccoonbox will solve it. Lol! üòÖ But really it is that simple when the web design is at its best. Just‚Äîplease‚Äîunderstand that simple is not easy. To make something simple you need a master. Ten years of experience in web design and university graduation on design is hopefully enough to solve your web issues. I believe it is! That is what you get when working with Raccoonbox. Good service!

Above some examples of Jaana Vuola's photography website and of the design progress. Her problem was not having a sleek and simple portfolio site which would present images in big form. Raccoonbox solved that problem.

Ok, this is a paragraph created by a bot simply to have some jargon and keywords. You can skip this and continue looking for our web design references üëáüèª ... üëÜüèª ‚Äì Good web design is user-friendly, visually appealing, and easy to navigate. It ensures quick load times, mobile compatibility, and accessibility for all users. With a clean layout, consistent branding, and intuitive interface, it provides a seamless and enjoyable experience, making information easy to find and interact with.

Autopesu-Center as a car wash company has a big humpback whale mascot. The client wanted to have underwater experience when his customer visits the website. So, Raccoonbox created this. The web sites starts from the waterline and goes deep into refreshing car washing water and finally meeting the famous humpback whale.

Finally, and I hope by this time you have already made a positive decision to approach Raccoonbox, I would like to stress out that mobile friendliness has become a standard for years in web design. It is a basic feature for a website to work on phone, tablet, desktop and TV. If someone says you otherwise please do not take candies from that man. This is the example of a real estate agent who wanted to have playful, mobile friendly website. Enjoy!

O, I almost forgot. The landing window on this website was most interesting. The small rectangles pointed diagonally were the menu buttons. I bet you have not seen such! There was no hamburger menu‚Äîsomething you see everywhere ‚ò∞, or typical vertical word aligned. No, it had this custom design where the user was encouraged to have new web browsing experience!

entry.title: Logo design
entry.summary: I find logo design very hard today due the fact that there are millions of robots generating meaningless icons and…
entry.content:
I find logo design very hard today due the fact that there are millions of robots generating meaningless icons and graphic. So while it was important to ask for professional to make solid logo it is now even more important to do so. Logos you see here have been designed by Raccoonbox.

The work you will see here are all test and proven to be working logos which are easy to spot, read and see no matter what background they are on or how big or small they are.

Man who created finance company Proventum said to me "Proventum is fair wind. Please create something that has a positive meaning and is related to kite." And so I did. 

Good logo design is to test it in different environments. Like for example, how well will it be visible when you will sponsor your favourite ice hockey team and print your logo on their shoulders. Or, when you will be filthy rich and have your own vessel. Wouldn't you like to have your brand presented on a flag?

Small size is no excuse for a logo to be unreadable.

I remember wife of the Politech Hydraulics leader asked me "Why there is this small notch in our logo?" It is for showing the direction to which hydraulics flow, I remember answering her. Politech's logo is two circles and stands for hydraulic system flowing within itself.

Finally the last example of Raccoonbox logo design is a logo for a police uniform. It is a representation of absolute masculinity, the balanced triangle surrounded by "triple S" slogans.

In general logos are hard to design when you pursue a pro logo. But when they are done they hold for centuries! Please do feel free to contact Raccoonbox for a logo design.

entry.title: Documentary
entry.summary: Raccoonbox is for the people. We help them share good stories. This page has a collection of the best documentary…
entry.content:
Raccoonbox is for the people. We help them share good stories. This page has a collection of the best documentary videos we have produced. The first video is about dominatrix Keiju who kicks, spanks and oppress here clients. Raccoonbox will not do that to you üòÖ.

Documentaries serve as an important historical record, capturing significant events, people, and social movements. They can also help preserve cultural traditions and practices that may be in danger of disappearing. This next documentary is a sweet love story about a man and a woman who met each other in a public Sompa sauna, naked.

A chilling documentary about a ice hole swimmer. Watch only if you are not cold.

This lady like to walk naked in the forest. Yes, she is a naturist, and that is a different thing to nudist. Nudist get dopamine and adrenaline shots when they expose themself. Naturists are simply uncomfortable wearing cloths. Full video here. Be sure to be 18 or older.

Raccoonbox documentaries serves as a powerful tool for education, inspiration, and social change. We offer a unique perspective on the world and can help you understand complex issues in a way that other forms of media may not be able to. This final example is a food documentary about local ingredients. A nice travel with fishermen over the ice.

Please feel encouraged to hire Raccoonbox operator üé•

entry.title: Commercials and trailers
entry.summary: The most important aspect of shorts, commercials and trailers is to make you see more. I think these videos are…
entry.content:
The most important aspect of shorts, commercials and trailers is to make you see more. I think these videos are just that. They give you enough of information to create desires.

Raccoonbox provides you compelling and engaging commercial video that showcases your products, services, and brand in a way that resonates with your target audience.

In addition, commercial video can help you build trust and credibility with your customers. By showcasing your expertise and sharing honest information, you can position yourself as a thought leader in your market.

The next video here is a trailer about a traditional Georgian kimchali (knife) blacksmith.

And this one is silly competition created by silly people but became a world phenomena because we all like to do some air guitar once in a while, don't we?

Give us a call! ü§ô
